attributes.action: not spend tax payers money arranging a state funeral for Mrs Margaret Thatcher.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any politician should receive the proper funeral rites courtesy of his/her family, friends, admirers etc. They should not be able to draw on tax payers funds to do so. Many tax payers supported Mrs Thatcher by voting for her; even more declined to do so. Like all politicians, to a greater or lesser extent, she was a controversial and divisive figure. To accord her the accolade of a State funeral, with its implied recognition and approval by ALL the country is presumptious, insulting to those who disagreed with her and inaccurate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
